statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-43 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} - 7 \, x - 52 , -x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - x - 4 , 40 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 40 , 21 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 24 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
